abstract: A senator who supports Northrop Grumman says the procedure for winning the bid favors a rival, Boeing.
snippet: A senator who supports Northrop Grumman says the procedure for winning the bid favors a rival, Boeing.
lead_paragraph: The battle over the Air Force’s latest attempt to award a contract for aerial refueling tankers is heating up, with the main competitors and their supporters in Congress calling for changes in the way the bids will be evaluated.

headline.main: Bid Process for Air Force Tanker Is Criticized
headline.print_headline: Bid Process for Air Force Tanker Is Criticized

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
